title: Taking their place
creator_credit: Jack S. Allan, Australian Commonwealth Film Unit and Loch Townsend
brief_description: Government film about the rehabilitation and re-employment of the physically handicapped in the “normal workforce”. Follows Noel Simpson, a paraplegic, through this process.
creator_credit_for_label: Jack S. Allan, Australian Commonwealth Film Unit and Loch Townsend
